name: The King's Request: Physiology and Anatomy Revision Game
description: This short adventure game uses your knowledge of the human body and concepts from science, biology, physiology, anatomy, medicine, biomed, nursing, pharmacy, health or exercise science as your weapon! There's no negative if you get a question wrong - so have a go and save the kingdom!!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 and higher Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo or better Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Integrated graphics or DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU Storage: 250 MB available space
